tweet: Across #Ohio, businesses are hiring more workers, raising wages & expanding thanks to #taxreform. But we must do more to address employers’ need for skilled workers in key industries. My bipartisan #JOBSAct will work to close this skills-gap.  https://bit.ly/2uALXXs

The National Aviation Heritage Area surrounding #Dayton spans 54 acres & 8 counties, including the home of the Wright Bros. It supports 1500 #jobs & generates $35M economic impact from 2M+ visitors per year.
